abstract: "Where in the World is Matt Lauer?" is being revived on the "Today" show after a three-year break.
snippet: "Where in the World is Matt Lauer?" is being revived on the "Today" show after a three-year break.
lead_paragraph: A signature of the "Today" show, "Where in the World is Matt Lauer?" is being revived after a three-year break.

headline.main: Where is Matt? Back Spanning the Globe
